question:
If the allegations turn out to be true and the school's administrators are found to be $\(\qquad\)$ , the university may lose its accreditation and the administrators might never be able to be employed in higher education again.
Two Answers
A. repentant
B. culpable
C. synoptic
D. contrite
E. complicit
F. unsound
